Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Wide goblet with a ring base, restricted mouth and simple lip, made from a fine pink clay. Two incised horizontal lines accentuate the location of the equatorial diametre on the exterior surface, which also bears a geometrical pattern painted in white. The latter is comprised of three series of nine little vertical lines, slightly oblique, spread out on the circumference of the vase, above the double incision, with which they overlap a little bit.
